name: moody

effect.sword_shield: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage. If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.

effect.legends_arceus: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage. If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.

short_effect: Raises a random stat two stages and lowers another one stage after each turn.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Raises one stat sharply and lowers another every turn.
